title: Welcome to My Personal Site
text:
This is a test page to ensure our Tufte-inspired light and dark themes are working correctly.


Here’s how the typography renders in different elements:

Bold Text: This is bold text.
Italicized Text: This is italicized text.
Inline Code: Here’s inline code using JetBrains Mono.

# Code block example (R)
x <- c(1, 2, 3)
mean(x)
# Code block example (Python)
numbers = [1, 2, 3]
average = sum(numbers) / len(numbers)
print(average)




“Good design is as little design as possible.”
— Dieter Rams

This is a sidenote example. Here’s a sentence with a sidenote.1
